channel.title: Server running error
channel.description:
I am using a VPS from VPSland so there is no way to portforward so I used the uTorrent way and opened port 43594 which worked perfect.
But now when I try to run my server I get this error: [code] Loaded clipmap in 65ms. [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: Launching HyBriD PvP... [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:119) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:59) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Press any key to continue . . .[/code Is there anyway to get around this??[/code]

item.title: Server running error
item.dc:creator: @MawV3 MawV3
item.description:
@MawV3 wrote:

I am using a VPS from VPSland so there is no way to portforward so I used the uTorrent way and opened port 43594 which worked perfect.

But now when I try to run my server I get this error:

Loaded clipmap in 65ms. [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: Launching HyBriD PvP... [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:119) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:59) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [6/13/11 2:29 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Press any key to continue . . .[/code Is there anyway to get around this??

Read full topic
